content.description: A lowball problem with a true sit start. Sink your talons into a couple of sick, incut crimps and hurl yourself up to a slopy hold using a mantle move to get yourself over the lip.
content.protection: Trad Climbers require no pads. But a couple of spotters and a few pads would open up a lot of potential to this part of the Black Eage Boulder

content.description: A sit start might add a number to the grade. The stand start requires a heel-toe cam and a good grip on some small, slopey holds  on the overhung face. Get sucked in and kick a heel hook up to a big, square crystal and trust some even smaller crimps above. Rock yourself on that heel hook and huck for the jug above and your flying outta there!
content.protection: A few pads and spotters would really make this a fun time.

content.description: A sick, little pebble located right next to the Happiness is Water formation. The FA's were done sans pads. But a few friends and a few pieces of padding would make this a great destination for any refugee from Baldy who is willing to walk a great distance.
